text: FIFA 06 is a 2005 association football simulation video game in Electronic Arts' FIFA series created by EA Canada and published by Electronic Arts. It was released for the Playstation 2, Playstation Portable, Xbox, GameCube, Game Boy Advance, Nintendo DS and Microsoft Windows. title: FIFA 06
